nodes.text:
The Stargazers was a cult of fanatics founded by the male Human Shunned Dalien Brock dedicated to finding a way to leave Tython system and to reach the stars of their ancestors by all means possible, even criminal. The sect operated out of an abandoned Dai Bendu temple on Kalimahr, the Stargazers Temple.
In the 25,793 BBY the Stargazer Sect attempted to leave the Tython system using a hypergate and dark matter, but were defeated by the Je'daii Ranger Lanoree Brock.
